storage_optimization.technique: Pack variables into fewer storage slots

function_optimization.technique: Use external instead of public for functions not called internally

loop_optimization.technique: Cache array length, use unchecked for counters

event_usage.technique: Use events instead of storage for historical data

batch_operations.technique: Batch multiple token transfers in one transaction

troubleshooting.mongodb_connection_error:
Ensure MongoDB is running: mongod --dbpath /path/to/db
OR use MongoDB Atlas: update MONGODB_URI in .env
troubleshooting.cors_errors: Check CORS_ORIGIN in backend .env matches frontend URL (http://localhost:3000)
troubleshooting.websocket_not_connecting: Verify backend is running on port 3210 and NEXT_PUBLIC_SOCKET_URL in frontend .env is correct
troubleshooting.port_already_in_use:
Backend: lsof -i :3210 && kill -9 <PID>
Frontend: lsof -i :3000 && kill -9 <PID>
troubleshooting.dependencies_installation_fails: Delete package-lock.json and node_modules, then npm install again
